name: 0-1576 library mouse
notes:
**knitted mouse bookmarker, with stripes in drops alpaca. theme: christmas.**

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern z-981
yarn group a

-------------------------------------------------------


**size**:
body circumference = 9 cm. length = 20 cm without head and tail.

**yarn**:
drops alpaca from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group a)
50 g colour 100, off white
50 g colour 618, nougat
50 g colour 5565, light maroon
50 g colour 9024, dark blush
+ left-over colour black for eyes and nose

weighs approx. 10 g without filling

**accessories**: wadding to fill.

**needles**:
drops double pointed needles size 3 mm.

**knitting tension**:
26 stitches in width and 34 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
note: needle size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches on 10 cm, change to a larger needle size. if you get too few stitches on 10 cm, change to a smaller needle size.
